H0.text: What island country lies off the southeast tip of India. Sri Lanka

H1.text: What island country lies off the southeast tip of India. Madagascar

H2.text: What island country lies off the southeast tip of India. Mauritius

H3.text: What island country lies off the southeast tip of India. Ceilan

A4.text: Sri Lanka lies on the Indian Ocean, southwest of the Bay of Bengal, and is separated from India by the Gulf of Mannar and the Palk Strait.

A5.text: Sri Lanka was formerly known as Ceylon.
